properties.entry: Información: Cada usuario conectado recibe unha mensaxe coa nova enquisa.
Sentimolo pero esta aula está completa. Ténteo máis tarde
Por favor introduza dúas veces o mesmo contrasinal con un mínimo de 6 caracteres
Vostede introduciu un enderezo de correo electrónico incorrecto
Enviar correo-e con ligazón de restablecemento
The email containing a special link has been sent to the email address, registered to the user corresponding to the data entered
Cambiouse o contrasinal, agora pode a iniciar sesión.
prema nunha sala para ver os detalles
Desactivar / activar a liña de cor
Desactivar / activar o recheo de cor
Eliminar o rexistro da conversa no servidor
Non hai moderador nesta sala, pero si participantes. Vostede pode esperar ou solicitar ser moderador.
Prema nesta ligazón para poder participar na xuntanza:
Prema aquí para entrar á sala
Se ten problemas coa ligazón, suxerímoslle que copie e pegue o seguinte texto no seu navegador:
Prema na seguiente ligazón para introducir un novo contrasinal:
Prema aquí para introducir un novo contrasinal
Perdeuse a conexión co servidor. Vostede precisa reiniciar o aplicativo e/ou comprobar a súa rede.

Crear usuarios, salas, organizacións
+ cambiar a configuración
Dialogo de cargar e importar. Por favor escolla un ficheiro do seu disco.

Realmente quere expulsar este cliente da conexión?
Isto só borra ao cliente da sala actual. O cliente pode volver a acceder de novo.
A súa sesión foi pechada por un administrador ou un moderador.
Ten a certeza de querer saír agora?
Por favor, agarde ata que o moderador entre na sala. O moderador pode ser un profesor, administrador, ou o creador desta sala.
Para completar o seu rexistro, por favor prema na seguinte ligazón. Ou copie o URL na barra de navegación do seu navegador.
Prema para verificar o seu correo-e
Ten que agardar até que un moderador entre na sala.
Ten a certeza de que desexa eliminar este elemento?
Pulse Iniciar para publicar o seu escritorio
Comprobe a configuración do seu micrófono e/ou cámara antes de entrar na sala. Para el grave durante algúns segundos e reprodúzao, deberá escoitar a súa voz e ver a súa imaxe.

Pode continuar sen facer a comprobación se non desexa publicar a imaxe e/ou o son. Os participantes sen son ou sen vídeo poden en todo caso utilizar o taboleiro, compartir o seu escritorio ou enviar mensaxes utilizando a liña de conversas.
As salas públicas son accesíbeis para todos os usuarios.
As salas privadas son accesíbeis só para os usuarios da mesma organización.
As salas nesta sección son para uso persoal. Creanse utilizando o calendario e teñen unha data de inicio e de final. Só están listadas nesta sección durante o período de tempo en que teñen validez.
Elixa unha sala para a xuntanza
Se a sala está moderada, sexa quen sexa xa o moderador seguirá a selo. Se non desexa que sexa así, e quere que só determinado usuario sexa o moderador, utilice a opción de moderador predeterminado.
Se engade unha organización á sala, só os usuarios de dita organización terán acceso á mesma (isto só é así se a marca de Pública está configurada como falsa!)
Ten a certeza de que desexa borar este elemento? Ten que premer no botón Gardar para almacenar os cambios!
Mostrar a posición do rato aos participantes
desexa compartir o seu escritorio. Desexa visualizalo?

Pode gravar e compartir o escritorio de vez. Para permitir que outros veaan o seu escritorio prema no botón Iniciar na parte superior. Para só gravar a sesión, é abondo que prema en Iniciar a grabación.
Desactive esta opción para evitar que calquera usuario o moleste nesta sala. Facendoo o boton para solicitar a moderación («Teño unha pregunta») non é visible.
Houbo algún erro mentres de procesaba a gravación.
La grabación no está aínda preparada para ver. Tenteo de novo dentro dun par de minutos.
The Conference Number and PIN is automatically created via the OpenXG RPC-Gateway
Clear objects on current slide only!

Backup the System. The Backup includes all User generated data. The configuration is not included as well as the language labels. Because those values are imported with the System Installer. To update your System, export your old system (1) re-install into a new database the new package (2) and import the Backup file again (3). The Backup should be imported before generating data in the newly installed system.
Turn this Flag on and the users will have only the Audio-Option and no Video in a conference room. This can by good to save bandwidth.
The webinar is already closed, you will be redirected to some interesting offerings in
If the room is closed users will be redirected to the exit URL.
The config files are in the folder webapps/openmeetings/conf. You need to manually upload the files to this folder. Changes to the config file are immediately online.

If you enable "Add Domain to username" the value of the field "domain" is added to each login that the user enters in the login box. This is useful if the Login in the Ldap is stored including the domain name. Example: User enters "hans" domain is specified as "localhost.com", login that is verified against Ldap is: hans@localhost.com
Choose a conference room. The invited user will get a message with your name and a link to the room.
would like to invite you to the conference room:
Check "TimeZone Message" to give users a message next time they login to update their profile.
Show contact data to contacts only
would like to add you as contact.
Check your contact requests in {0} or click on those links to accept or deny the request
Click to write a new message to any of your contacts
Add an optional request for meeting to the message and create a conference room. The Event is then copied in the calendar of every participant.
Add folders and organize your messages!
The user does not share his personal contact data.
The user does share his personal contact data only to contacts.
Click here to visit your profile to see the full message ...
Do you really want to remove this whiteboard? This action cannot be undone.
Do not forget start recording! One user per room always needs to start it to have the recording afterwards.
Do you really want to delete the complete content on the whiteboard?
Do you really want to delete the content on the current slide?
Are you sure you want to close this Poll? No one will be able to vote
Are you sure you want to delete this Poll? The results will be deleted as well.
Changing the resolution affects bandwidth, bigger picture needs more bandwith!

Password protected are the links to the conference that are send to the participents when you save the calendar event, not the room! That means if you save the event multiple times but with different passwords every participent receives a new link that has a different password. But old links still work once send!
Reduce the width of the SharingScreen before you try to move it left
Reduce the height of the SharingScreen before you try to move it bottom
Reduce the x of the SharingScreen before you try to make it wider
Reduce the y of the SharingScreen before you try to make it higher
Fill these settings stream your screen data to 3th party providers like justin.tv
Please start Screen sharing to be able to publish it
Moderator permission required to start recording
Upload new file to file explorer
Open new dialog with sharing settings
An existing moderator must approve it
Ask moderator to share your webcam/microphone
Gather feedback by creating a poll
Past and current poll results as charts
Vote if there is a poll for this conference room
Send an email with a direct link to this room
Ask moderator to share your whiteboard

To save time and internet traffic you can use command line admin to backup/restore/upgrade:
  1. go to OM install dir (for ex. /opt/om)
  2. stop OM (for ex. ./bin/shutdown.sh)
  3. ./admin.sh -b -file ~/today_om_backup.zip (create backup of current OM)
  4. download archive with new OM
  5. mv /opt/om /opt/om.bak (move working version of OM just in case :))
  6. extract downloaded OM to the /opt/om
  7. ./admin.sh -i -file ~/today_om_backup.zip (or './admin.sh -i -file ~/today_om_backup.zip --db-type mysql --db-user om_user --db-pass om_user_pass' in case of you are using non-default DB )
  8. start OM
Rooms common to the current user group
Include uploaded files and recordings in backup
Enable SIP transport in the room
Widget displaying basic user info and support links
You can enter email address in the format: firstname1 lastname1 <email1> or "firstname2 lastname2" <email2> or 'firstname3 lastname3' <email3> or email
End date entered is earlier than start date.
Access denied. You have no rights to enter this room.
Access denied. You are not authorized to perform this action.
A súa conta foi creada, a partires deste momento xa pode iniciar unha sesión
You have entered incorrect captcha text
'Weak' password: at least 1 digit is required
'Weak' password: at least 1 lower-case letter is required
'Weak' password: at least 1 special symbol '!@#$%^&*][' is required
'Weak' password: it shouldn't contain part of the user's email address or username
'Weak' password: at least 1 upper-case letter is required
Error in making connection on the URL specified.
The have been errors while processing the file
Are you sure you want to delete all temporary files? This operation cannot be undone.
Configuration with given key already exists, please specify another key or edit existent configuration
This user is already in your contact list or has received an invitation to your contact list that is not answered yet.
O código do convite é incorrecto. O convite ao través de ligazón ten validez só no momento da xuntanza! vostede non pode acceder á sala antes ou despois da reunión a través desa ligazón!
You invitation code is not valid, the code is only valid during this specific date and time:
Este convite xa foi usado e non pode utilizarse de novo.
Este nome de usuario xa existe
User is not assigned to group.
A súa conta non está activada. Antes use a ligazón do correo-e que recebiu durante o rexistro.
A ferramenta de rexistro está desactivada.
Conference room with microphone option set
Presentation room with microphone option set

Unable to load proper DB driver, please download appropriate jar file, and restart the OM. Instructions: {0}

Recommendation for production environment

By default {0} uses the integrated {1} database. For production environment you should consider using {2}, {3}, {4}, {5} or {6}

NOTE Please use unpredictable DB login and 'strong' password with length 8 characters or more.
Please click "Finish" button to start installation!

New Users need to verify their EMail
DPI that ImageMagic will use for PDF to image conversion (default is 150)
Enter the dpi that ImageMagic will use for PDF to image conversion
Enter the quality of embedded jpeg pictures to quality. 0 is worst (small), 100 is best (big). (default:90)
Enter the quality of embedded jpeg pictures to quality. 0 is worst (small), 100 is best (big). (default:90)
Enter the path to FFMPEG, leave blank if FFMPEG is successfully installed to system-path

Install ImageMagick on the server, you can get more information on http://www.imagemagick.org regarding installation. The instructions for installation can be found there http://www.imagemagick.org/script/binary-releases.php, however on most linux systems you can get it via your favorite package managers (apt-get it)
Enter the path to ImageMagick, leave blank if ImageMagick is successfully installed to system-path
The path to OpenOffice/LibreOffice (optional) please set this to the real path in case jodconverter is unable to find OpenOffice/LibreOffice installation
The path to OpenOffice/LibreOffice (optional) please set this to the real path in case jodconverter is unable to find OpenOffice/LibreOffice installation automatically
Install SoX http://sox.sourceforge.net/ You should install SoX in a up to date copy! SoX 12.xx will NOT work!
Enter the path to SoX, leave blank if SoX is successfully installed to system-path

You can use this default crypt type which is equal to PHP-MD5 function or BSD-Style encryption by using:org.apache.openmeetings.utils.crypt.MD5CryptImplementation for more information or to write your own Crypt-Style see: Custom Crypt Mechanism You can edit this value later BUT previous created Users and Sessions might be not usable anymore
Enter the Class name of the Encryption Class. DO NOT ALTER THIS IF YOU ARE NOT SURE
Prefix for phone number of conference rooms

1. Enabling import of PDFs into whiteboard

    • Install GhostScript on the server, you can get more information on http://pages.cs.wisc.edu/~ghost/ regarding installation. The instructions for installation can be found there, however on most linux systems you can get it via your favorite package managers (apt-get it).

"democratic" by default, every user can directly enable audio/video without need for asking
only 2 users can have audio/video enabled (more users can be in the room and you can switch the audio/video between them of course)
"restricted" by default: Every regular user will need to ask if he wants to share audio/video
Your recent {0} recording will be automatically deleted in {1} days. If you would like to save this recording, please download it before then.

Rexistrouse correctamente. Enviamoslle un correo-e cun código de verificación. Por favor, comprobe a súa bandexa de entrada de correo.
